Articles.Content: Hey guys,this is the raw version of my company logo WITHOUT the title. So,what do u think?

Meh.

Kerbin doesn't have blobby continents and the lensflare is really overpowering.

It doesn't feel like there was enough effort put into it.

If you're going to make it a logo/mission patch or whatever, I suggest being a bit more simplistic.

Look at real world logos. Don't copy them but definitely try to learn from them. That goes for all artwork really.

Meh.

Kerbin doesn't have blobby continents and the lensflare is really overpowering.

It does say it is a raw version.

Meh.

Kerbin doesn't have blobby continents and the lensflare is really overpowering.

It doesn't feel like there was enough effort put into it.

If you're going to make it a logo/mission patch or whatever, I suggest being a bit more simplistic.

Look at real world logos. Don't copy them but definitely try to learn from them. That goes for all artwork really.

I remember using twice as much lens flare then I should've.
Nice work, i don't think you need to worry about blobby continents, it gives the picture a touch of impressionism. The glare maybe tone down a little bit.
jj abrams would be proud of this lense flare
I've actually caught a glimpse of a scene similar to this. It's incredible.
